name: The Boy Who Got In Trouble
name_original: The Boy Who Got In Trouble
description:
The Boy was sent to bed.  He didn't stay there.  Now he must defend himself against an onslaught of Mothers who all want him to "Go to bed!".  His only defense is his scream.

A fast-paced, one-screen dungeon/shmup.  Scream to attack -  move to survive.

Art, story, code, and design by a genuine ten-year-old who has lived the nightmare.

How long can you stay out of bed?
